title: Borderlands®3: Ultimate Edition
description: Borderlands 3 Ultimate Edition features the base game, all 6 content add-ons, & full collection of bonus cosmetic packs! Season Pass • Moxxi’s Heist of the Handsome Jackpot • Guns, Love, and Tentacles: The Marriage of Wainwright & Hammerlock • Bounty of Blood • Psycho Krieg and the Fantastic Fustercluck Season Pass 2 • Designer's Cut content add-on, featuring new mode 'Arms Race' & an additional skill tree for each Vault Hunter • Director's Cut content add-on, featuring a raid boss, new story missions, behind-the-scenes extras, & 3 Vault Cards • All 4 Multiverse Final Form Cosmetic Packs • All 4 Multiverse Disciples of the Vault Cosmetic Packs Bonus Content: • Butt Stallion Pack • Retro Cosmetic Pack • Neon Cosmetic Pack • Gearbox Cosmetic Pack • Toy Box Weapons Pack • Equippable XP & Loot Drop Boost Mods
